vaultSetup.notEnoughFunds: Not enough funds, ThunderDen requests vaulting at least {{largestMinVaultAmount}} sats (after fees) so that it will be possible to recover at least {{minRecoverableRatioPercentage}}% of the vaulted value in case of an extreme high fee scenario in the future. You currently have {{utxosDataBalance}} sats. However, you can only vault {{lowestMaxVaultAmount}} at most (after fees), assuming you pick express confirmation times. Please add an additional {{missingFunds}} sats.
